ore:describes.Title: Replication Data for: Birkeland Current Boundary Flows Associated with Field Line Resonance

citation:Description.dsDescription:Text: Processed SuperDARN High Resolution (HiRes) data presented in the paper.

Subject: Astronomy and Astrophysics
Earth and Environmental Sciences
Physics

Related Publication.Citation: Fenrich, F. R., R. Rankin, D. Sydorenko, W. E. Archer, D. J. Knudsen (2021), Birkeland current boundary flows associated with field line resonances, Journal of Geophysical Research Space Physics, submitted Nov 2020.

ore:describes.citation:Notes: Raw Super Dual Auroral Radar Data (SuperDARN) can be accessed at superdarn.ca.
ore:describes.Kind of Data: Processed 2-dimensional ionospheric plasma convection data derived from raw SuperDARN high-frequency radar line-of-sight data.
Other References: Fenrich, F. R., Gillies, D. M., Donovan, E., & Knudsen, D. (2019) Flow velocity and field-aligned current associated with field line resonance: SuperDARN measurements, J. Geophys. Res. Space Physics, 124, 4889-4904, https://doi.org/10.1029/2019JA026529.

Bristow, W. A., D. L. Hampton, and A. Otto (2016), High-spatial-resolution velocity measurements derived using Local Divergence-Free Fitting of SuperDARN observations, J. Geophys. Res., 121, 1349â€“1361, https://doi.org/10.1002/2015JA021862.

Greenwald, R. A., K. B. Baker, J. R. Dudeney, M. Pinnock, T. B. Jones, E. C. Thomas, J.-P. Villain, J.-C. Cerisier, C. Senior, C. Hanuise, R. D. Hunsucker, G. Sofko, J. Koehler, E. Nielsen R. Pellinen, A. D. M. Walker, N. Sato, and H. Yamagishi (1995), DARN/SUPERDARN: A global view of the dynamics of high-latitude convection, Space Sci. Rev., 71, 761-796, https://doi.org/10.1007/BF00751350 .
ore:describes.schema:name: Replication Data for: Birkeland Current Boundary Flows Associated with Field Line Resonance

ore:aggregates.schema:description: SuperDARN High Resolution (HiRes) data corresponding to 06:00 UT to 09:00 UT on Dec 19, 2013.  Columns: time (hours), magnetic longitude, magnetic latitude, east-west velocity (east positive), north-south velocity (north positive), line-of-sight flag.
ore:aggregates.schema:name: 20131219_0600_hires.dat

ore:aggregates.schema:description: SuperDARN High Resolution (HiRes) data corresponding to 07:26 UT to 09:33 UT on Dec 19, 2013.  Columns: time (hours), magnetic longitude, magnetic latitude, east-west velocity (east positive), north-south velocity (north positive), line-of-sight flag.
ore:aggregates.schema:name: 20140410_0726_hires.dat
